title: Leblanc mimic refund cooldown
body:
The wiki say:

Shadow Rose: summons a Mimic at the target location, refunding Mimic's cooldown but placing Shadow of the Rose on its own cooldown. This Mimic immediately disappears upon casting its selected ability.

Can omeone explain me this?

replies.body:
>summons a Mimic at the target location
>This Mimic immediately disappears upon casting its selected ability.

R+R to spawn a clone that pretends to cast an ability.

>refunding Mimic's cooldown but placing Shadow of the Rose on its own cooldown

R+Q/W/E to copy ability. R+R and R+Q/W/E are on separate cooldowns.
